answers.answer: Hi,How is your husband? Both interstitial lung disease and diabetes may indeed cause weight loss. Interstitial lung diseases or  interstitial pulmonary fibrosis may run a gradual course or a rapid course. Some of the diseases improve with medication if treated when inflammation occurs while some people may need oxygen therapy as part of the treatment. It is important that regular follow-up is done with your doctor for proper management. Also, blood sugar needs to be monitored as well. This link may help: http://medicalcenter.osu.edu/patientcare/healthcare_services/lung_diseases/lung/interstitiallung/Pages/index.aspxTake care an do keep us posted.
